txt.en: Thranduil can be found in the halls of Felegoth.\n\nYou should return to Thranduil.
There is still prey caught in the webs of this abandoned den

'Upon returning to these halls after the trials of battle, I learned of something surpassingly strange: the spiders of these woods are no more. Not by us were they slain, nor by any hand, from all we can tell. They have simply vanished, it seems, leaving only their web-covered dens.\n\n'Any person in my kingdom, be they Elf or not, who unravels this mystery shall earn my regard and generosity.'
Only a few lost broodlings remain here
Known spider dens can be found throughout Eryn Lasgalen.\n\nYou should search the woods and remaining spider-dens for spiders.
I learned of something surpassingly strange: the spiders of these woods are no more.
Have you any news of the spiders' vanishing?
The spiders have vanished from all over Mirkwood, and King Thranduil wishes to know why.

'You have returned. Have you any news of the spiders' vanishing?'

You relate all you found.

'I see. Then they have truly left. Perhaps with Sauron's fall and the greening of these woods, they seek refuge in darker places?

'If there be naught left but broodling stragglers, we should concern ourselves with more pressing matters.'
